welcome.data: Warm-Up Prompt: “Which do you prefer so far—Flexbox or Grid? Why?” Students discuss in pairs and take a quick poll.

aim.data: Learn how to combine Flexbox and Grid layouts effectively to create complex, responsive layouts.

review.data: Review Flexbox vs. Grid. Ask: 'What types of layouts are better suited for each?' Revisit past examples.

relevant.data: Explain combining Flexbox and Grid for layout flexibility. Show examples using live coding in WebStorm.

interactive.data: Students build a dashboard layout using Grid for structure and Flexbox for inner alignment (header/sidebar).

ownership.data: Challenge: Students create a portfolio layout using both Grid and Flexbox. Push to GitHub.

resonate.data: Exit Ticket: Students write where they'd use Grid vs. Flexbox in their own site idea.

supplies.data: Computers with WebStorm, GitHub access, projector, example files.
